DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to test the efficacy of a vaccine against house dust mite and/or cat allergy compared to placebo in adult patients.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate an Immunomodulatory Therapy in Adult Patients With Perennial Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Mild to moderate perennial allergic rhinoconjunctivitis due to hypersensitization towards house dust mite and/or cat allergens Clinical relevant other allergies (perennial or seasonal) that could potentially interfere with the patient's study treatment schedule or assessments. Use of any concomitant medication that could affect the patient's study treatment response or assessment results. Any clinically relevant concomitant disease as judged by the investigator. Pregnancy or female planning to become pregnant during the study.
